channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Michael McIntyre's The Wheel
channel.desc: Michael McIntyre is back with his hit game show that's packed with huge stars, big laughs and a giant spinning wheel. Can the contestants answer their way to a fortune? The celebrities on this edition of The Wheel are Susan Wokoma, Roman Kemp, Layton Williams, Katherine Ryan, Jill Scott and Joe Marler, and Steve Pemberton and Reece Shearsmith are in the Double Chair.
